components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component that provides the base structure for the entire application with RTL support for Hebrew

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Bold, attention-grabbing hero section with headline, subheadline and booking CTA

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of salon services with pricing and details

components.name: GallerySection
components.description: Visual portfolio showcasing the salon's work with before/after photos

components.name: BookingSection
components.description: Interactive appointment booking system with calendar and service selection

components.name: StylistsSection
components.description: Showcase of the salon's professional stylists and their specialties

components.name: ProductsSection
components.description: Display of hair care products sold by the salon

components.name: TestimonialsSection
components.description: Customer reviews and testimonials to build trust

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Frequently asked questions about salon services and policies

components.name: ContactSection
components.description: Contact information and form for customer inquiries

components.name: PromotionsSection
components.description: Special offers, discounts and seasonal promotions

components.name: LocationSection
components.description: Salon location with map, directions and business hours

components.name: Footer
components.description: Website footer with navigation, social links and legal information

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Responsive navigation bar with logo, menu and booking button

components.name: Button
components.description: Reusable button component with variants for different purposes

components.name: Card
components.description: Reusable card component for displaying various content types

components.name: SectionHeader
components.description: Reusable section header with title, subtitle and optional decoration

components.name: ImageGallery
components.description: Reusable image gallery component with lightbox functionality

components.name: Accordion
components.description: Reusable accordion component for FAQs and expandable content

components.name: Form
components.description: Reusable form component with validation and submission handling
